subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Siyani Chambers scored 17 points as Harvard captured the Ivy League title and became the first team to clinch a berth in this year’s N.C.A.A. tournament with a 70-58 win over Yale in New Haven.
snippet: Siyani Chambers scored 17 points as Harvard captured the Ivy League title and became the first team to clinch a berth in this year’s N.C.A.A. tournament with a 70-58 win over Yale in New Haven.
